item.title: HD-2D Action-RPG The Adventures Of Elliot: The Millennium Tales Coming To Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

A brand-new HD-2D action RPG from Square Enix has been announced for the Switch 2 during today's Nintendo Direct presentation. The Adventures of Elliot: The Millennium Tales is set to release during 2026, but a demo will be available later today followed by a post-play survey to get feedback from players.

This story is developing...

item.title: Hyrule Warriors: Age Of Imprisonment Trailer Shows Partner Attacks And More
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

The Age of Imprisonment draws near.

During today's Nintendo Direct presentation, Koei Tecmo debuted a new trailer for Hyrule Warriors: Age of Imprisonment. The new gameplay showed off new partner-based attacks, where two characters join forces for crowd-clearing attacks.

This story is breaking...

Nintendo Direct July 2025: All The Biggest Announcements

item.title: Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection Announced, Coming To Switch 2 Next Year
item.content:encoded:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Nintendo's first post-Switch-2-launch Direct is here, and its first Partner Direct for the platform. Kicking things off, Capcom revealed Monster Hunter Stories 3: Twisted Reflection, the latest in a spin-off series that started life on the Nintendo 3DS. It looks like you once again take on the role of a rider as opposed to hunter, with you being the sole Rathalos rider in this game's world Azuria. While it was all in-game footage, no actual gameplay was shown off, but it is slated for release in 2026.

According to a press release, this threequel follows the "story of two nations on the path to ruin." That consists of the aforementioned Azuria, and Vermeil. A recently discovered egg, the one seen in the trailer, offers up some hope amongst the conflict, only for twin Rathalos to hatch from it with the same mark as the twin Skyscale Rathalos, "portents of destruction that hearken back to a civil war waged 200 years ago."

The rider you play as is the heir to Azuria, protecting monsters and people across the land, when a "life-changing event" forces them to set out towards "the forbidden land beyond the northern Meridian." They are then joined by Eleanor, princess of the rival nation Vermeil, driven by her concern over her sister the queen of Vermeil's true intentions.

Capcom also confirmed post-Direct that this won't be a Nintendo Switch 2 exclusive, as it's also coming to PS5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC via Steam.

For more on today's showcase, make sure to check-up our roundup of all the biggest Nintendo Direct announcements.

Got a news tip or want to contact us directly? Email news@gamespot.com



https://www.gamespot.com/articles/monster-hunter-stories-3-twisted-reflection-announced-coming-to-switch-2-next-year/1100-6533579/?ftag=CAD-01-10abi2f
